connector.description: Get Events from an Infinispan cache

camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.hosts.name: camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.hosts
camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.hosts.description: Specifies the host of the cache on Infinispan instance

camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.secure.name: camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.secure
camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.secure.description: If the Infinispan instance is secured or not

camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.security.name: camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.securityRealm
camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.security.description: Define the security realm to access the infinispan instance

camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.security.name: camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.securityServerName
camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.security.description: Define the security server name to access the infinispan instance

camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.eventTyp.name: camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.eventTypes
camel.kamelet.infinispan-source.eventTyp.description: Specifies the set of event types to register by the consumer.Multiple event can be separated by comma. The possible event types are CLIENT_CACHE_ENTRY_CREATED, CLIENT_CACHE_ENTRY_MODIFIED, CLIENT_CACHE_ENTRY_REMOVED, CLIENT_CACHE_ENTRY_EXPIRED, CLIENT_CACHE_FAILOVER
